pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw:
Thanks. I believe it's not quite redundant since `const` controls access and `static` also controls storage. However, I have learned that `const` should be preferred over `static` in cases like this: 

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1315292/static-constant-versus-constant-in-a-function-that-is-called-repeatedly

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3730000/can-static-local-variables-cut-down-on-memory-allocation-time
content.html:
Thanks. I believe it's not quite redundant since const controls access and static also controls storage. However, I have learned that const should be preferred over static in cases like this:

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1315292/static-constant-versus-constant-in-a-function-that-is-called-repeatedly

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3730000/can-static-local-variables-cut-down-on-memory-allocation-time
